ygData.subject: Re: AC Dilemma [and other misc stuff]
ygData.msgSnippet: Slyde, My personal opinion is skip the steel.  You have 850 plat.  that is enough $ to start getting lambent.  I am only lvl 23 and i have 2 lambent bracers
ygData.messageBody:
Slyde,

My personal opinion is skip the steel. You have 850 plat. that is enough $ to
start getting lambent. I am only lvl 23 and i have 2 lambent bracers and the
lambent [arms]. I also have the Black Silk Gloves (looted last night..first
time in mistmoore) and a lambent stone....hopefully i will get the shin
gauntlets soon. My biggest problem has been the money, which you have got. I
cannot even run thru North Karana without hearing someone shout "Free Griffenne
Charm at Loc XXXX, XXXX".

Yes, steel does look cool, and 1 or 2 ac is a significant difference. But, you
can start questing for lambent now. I try to avoid expenditures on stopgaps.
(i am using Snakeskin Gloves, because i looted them myself at 11th lvl, and i
would rather save any extra resources becuase Elf Hide Gloves are a band-aid
between Snakeskin and Lambent, IMSO)

SIDENOTE:
Mistmoore is cool, but man those are some ugly trains. Great for loot, bad for
XP (at lvl 23 mind you) I was in a group with a 28 Pal, 28 Cler, 27 Cler, 25
Dru, 24 Monk, and me. The monk and i were just there because the others were
bored i guess? it was just the monk and i, and the other 4 straggled in and
asked to join our group...weird. But, i like grouping with people higher level
than me. In spite of the danger, i get to learn alot about how the zone
functions.

Anyone on Prexus have a Ice, Fire or Slime Crystal staff? I am getting
Desperate....I really want to dual wield Crystal Staves....

Kaleid (nope, still no last name)
<Wave of the Dark Tide>
23rd Stanza
Prexus (the "i have not seen anything higher level than me in Kithicor"
Server)

> Call me indecisive - but money accumulates in my bank - cause I can never
>decide what to spend it on. I have in the neighborhood of 850pp. I'm not too
>thrilled with my armor. Mostly some banded still a lot of barbed, etc. A few
>pieces of bronze. I'm at level 26 btw - so I'm almost at the point where I
can
>think about questing for Lambent.
> But anyway - I got to the armor store in E Freeport and look at the Steel
>Plate. I notice that they mostly offer 1 or 2 AC points above the equivalent
>banded. Same as Bronze with a small weight saving. Question is - is it worth
>it? How important is one or two AC points? How important is 2 or 3 but
giving
>up STR or whatever bonuses. I have Blackened Iron Shoulders. It says "Magic
>Item". What does this actually provide? Is the Steel Pauldron the
equivalent?
> Pretty annoying you can't tell without buying and then you can sell it at a
>fraction of what you pay for it if you make a mistake (obviously forcing you
to
>check website like EQualizer...
> Anyone have any other suggestions on what to spend money on? For weaps
I'm
>using Dirk and Barbed Leather Whip.Thanks!Slyde

=====
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
